IndexPage.title: Little Lemon
IndexPage.description: We are a family-owned Mediterranean restaurant, focused on traditional recipes served with a modern twist.

card1.title: Greek Salad
card1.description: A Greek salad is a dish consisting of pieces of tomatoes, cucumbers, onion, feta cheese, and olives, typically seasoned with salt, oregano, and olive oil.

card2.title: Bruchetta
card2.description: Bruschetta is an antipasto from Italy consisting of grilled bread rubbed with garlic and topped with olive oil and salt.

card3.title: Lemon Dessert
card3.description: Lemon is a sweet dessert that typically consists of a mixture of lemon juice, sugar, and eggs that is cooked until thickened and then served cold.
